archimate:Goal.name: Understanding on how to manage security risk on systems, assets, data, and capabilities defined
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Goal definition based on the NIST Cybersecurity Framework - Wikipedia <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NIST_Cybersecurity_Framework>
The standardized service needs an aligned and signed scope, SLA and tooling platform with a clear ownership, roles, and governance model. Develop a common understanding on how to deliver security monitoring. Scope, tooling, SLA, method, capabilities, roles and responsibilities for Security Monitoring identified
